dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, did you catch the news about the International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition? Just wrapped up in Riyadh.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, did you catch the news about the International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition? Just wrapped up in Riyadh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: RIYADH The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition 2024 wrapped up last night, hosted by the Saudi Falcons Club under the theme A World Like You. Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I did! Yeah, I saw some headlines. Sounded, like, pretty massive this year, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I did! Yeah, I saw some headlines. Sounded, like, pretty massive this year, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Massive is an understatement, honestly. Hosted by the Saudi Falcons Club, theme was 'A World Like You'. They had it for ten days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Massive is an understatement, honestly. Hosted by the Saudi Falcons Club, theme was A World Like You. They had it for ten days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Saudi Falcons and Hunting Exhibition 2024 wrapped up last night, hosted by the Saudi Falcons Club under the theme A World Like You. Over the course of 10 days...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ten days! Wow. So, how many people actually showed up? Because, um, I heard it was a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten days! Wow. So, how many people actually showed up? Because, um, I heard it was a big deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huge! Over 640,000 visitors, from Saudi Arabia and internationally. And, uh, more than 400 exhibitors representing 45 different countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huge! Over six hundred forty thousand visitors, from Saudi Arabia and internationally. And, uh, more than four hundred exhibitors representing forty five different countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-five countries? That's incredible. [interrupts] I mean, what kind of stuff were they actually showing? I heard about some, like, super fancy items.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-five countries? That's incredible. I mean, what kind of stuff were they actually showing? I heard about some, like, super fancy items.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you heard right. They had these exquisite handcrafted items – falcon masks, rings, gloves, all adorned with gold, silver, diamonds. Get this: one falcon mask was priced at $36,000!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you heard right. They had these exquisite handcrafted items - falcon masks, rings, gloves, all adorned with gold, silver, diamonds. Get this: one falcon mask was priced at thirty six thousand dollars!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the offerings are a range of falcon masks, rings, and gloves, all intricately adorned with gold, silver, and diamonds. This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Thirty-six THOUSAND dollars for a falcon mask? Whoa. That's, um, serious dedication to falconry right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirty-six THOUSAND dollars for a falcon mask? Whoa. That's, um, serious dedication to falconry right there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Talal AlShamaisi, the CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, he attributed all this success to the strong backing from Saudi leadership. It's all about preserving their rich falconry heritage, you know, part of Vision 2030.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Talal AlShamaisi, the C E O of the Saudi Falcons Club, he attributed all this success to the strong backing from Saudi leadership. It's all about preserving their rich falconry heritage, you know, part of Vision twenty thirty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts. He attributed this achievement to the strong backing of the Saudi Leadership, which is committed to preserving the nation's rich falconry heritage, in line with the objectives of Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I remember reading about that. It’s not just about, like, tradition either, is it? He also talked about it boosting economic activity and sales in the sector.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I remember reading about that. It's not just about, like, tradition either, is it? He also talked about it boosting economic activity and sales in the sector.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This, he added, has stimulated economic activity and boosted sales within the falconry and hunting sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They expanded the exhibition space three times its previous size this year – 160,000 square meters! First time it reached full capacity, which is insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They expanded the exhibition space three times its previous size this year - one hundred sixty thousand square meters! First time it reached full capacity, which is insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exhibition space this year was expanded to three times its previous size, covering 160,000 square meters. ... For the first time in its history, the exhibition reached full capacity, driving a significant boost in sales across all sections, including falconry, hunting, outdoor adventures, vehicles, and related hobbies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That explains the visitor numbers, then. And I guess they had more than just, like, fancy masks too? What else was going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That explains the visitor numbers, then. And I guess they had more than just, like, fancy masks too? What else was going on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, loads. Remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demos, even military performances. Plus, like, 20 panel discussions and workshops.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, loads. Remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demos, even military performances. Plus, like, twenty panel discussions and workshops.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Highlights included remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demonstrations, and military performances. The event also featured more than 20 panel discussions and specialized workshops in falconry...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a real family event then, not just for serious hunters. I also saw something about them signing a bunch of strategic agreements, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a real family event then, not just for serious hunters. I also saw something about them signing a bunch of strategic agreements, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, seven big ones. With national bodies like the Quality of Life Program, the National Center for Wildlife Development, even King Saud University. It's all about strengthening cultural heritage and environmental preservation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, seven big ones. With national bodies like the Quality of Life Program, the National Center for Wildlife Development, even King Saud University. It's all about strengthening cultural heritage and environmental preservation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the Saudi Falcons Club signed seven strategic agreements with national bodies, including the Quality of Life Program, the National Center for Wildlife Development, the Saudi Camel Federation, the Special Forces for Environmental Security, King Saud Universitys Center of Excellence in Biotechnology Research, King Khalid University, and the National Agricultural Services Company. These partnerships aim to strengthen the Kingdoms cultural heritage, preserve falconrys environmental legacy, support scientific research, raise environmental awareness, and provide training and qualification programs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's really smart, thinking about the future and sustainability. So, what's next for them, then? More falconry stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's really smart, thinking about the future and sustainability. So, what's next for them, then? More falconry stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Saudi Falcons Club Auction is running until November 15th, focused on local falcons. And then they're planning the inaugural Falcons Club Cup, plus the King Abdulaziz Falconry Festival.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Saudi Falcons Club Auction is running until November fifteenth, focused on local falcons. And then they're planning the inaugural Falcons Club Cup, plus the King Abdulaziz Falconry Festival.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Saudi Falcons Club's events for the 2024-2025 season will continue with the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, focused on local falcons, running until November 15. Preparations are also underway for the inaugural Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin, alongside the King Abdulaziz Falconry Festival and the AlUla Falcons Cup.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like, uh, falconry is definitely on the rise in Saudi Arabia. Pretty cool to see such a vibrant cultural event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like, uh, falconry is definitely on the rise in Saudi Arabia. Pretty cool to see such a vibrant cultural event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely a growing global reputation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely a growing global reputation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The CEO emphasized the exhibitions global significance, noting its growing reputation, which has attracted investors and exhibitors from across the world.
